svg.text: Update #0.06969
Bittensor has not added support for checking hotkey balances, only stake assigned to
someone. To check balance I need coldkey. So only have one hotkey per coldkey.
To make multiple accounts just make a new coldkey.
LOL gives emissions to the largest token holders.
Subnet number 28
With only one module, validators score miners
based on how much Alpha Token they own.
Miners need not run any code at all.
Miners
Purchasing the token grants rewards. The more tokens a miner owns
the more emissions they receive. To purchase tokens run the following command:
btcli stake add --netuid 28 --subtensor.network finney --wallet.name NAME
--wallet.hotkey HOTKEY
When prompted for the Hotkey to stake to, input the Owners hotkey with the address:
5DZGfZXXUR7uEranwPeesFsEpfyt5WazGDxzJgTyvHc8pUP1
Why you should stake to the Owner hotkey:
• We use 18% Take to reduce root selling
• If enough people ask me to use 0% take I will happily do it
• We will never register the Validator as a Miner; it is excluded from competing.
Other Validators can use their Rewards to bolster their balance and compete against you
After purchasing Alpha tokens you can register on the subnet:
btcli subnets register --netuid NUM --wallet.name NAME --wallet.hotkey HOTKEY
--subtensor.network finney
This is all you need to do. You do not need to run a miner. So long as you do not get
deregistered, you will earn emissions proportional to your share of overall Alpha tokens.
The key holding the least amount of alpha tokens
will be deregistered by the subsequent registration on the subnet.
Game Rewards
The subnet rewards miners that buy the token. The rewards scale linearly
except for the top 5 slots. The top slot earns 2X their linear value.
Positions 2-5 earn 1.5X their linear value.
I accept PR's to the lol folder
The "Alpha Token" ("dTAO"), is a digital token issued on a specific subnet of
the Bittensor network, classified under current U.S. legislation as a "meme coin."
As such, it is imperative to understand that under the laws established during
the Trump presidency in 2025, meme coins are recognized to possess no intrinsic monetary value.
Purchasers of Alpha Token acknowledge and accept the risks inherent in acquiring
a meme coin, which include, but are not limited to, the complete loss of money invested.
The Alpha Token is purely for experimental and entertainment purposes,
and it should not be purchased as an investment or with the expectation of any financial return.
No representation or warranty is made, express or implied, with respect to the legality,
reliability, accuracy, or completeness of Alpha Token or the associated subnet on the Bittensor network.
The issuers of Alpha Token shall not be liable for any losses or damages,
whether direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential, incurred as a result of the token's use
or reliance on any information regarding its intended utility.
By purchasing, holding, or using Alpha Token, you expressly acknowledge and assume
these risks and agree to hold harmless and indemnify the issuers and developers
against any claims or legal proceedings.
Please consult legal and financial experts before engaging in any transactions involving
meme coins or other speculative digital assets. Participation is strictly at your own risk.
